Articles.Content:
I have tested the game for a few days and i\'m really impressed with the game. After a few hours i got puzzled how this has not been thought of before, its ingenious!. Been creeping the forum, and found out this is definitively a community i want to be a part of. I would like to thank the developers for going through with this. so.. Thanks!!

Colb out!

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky
Welcome to the Kerbal Space Program Forums!
